description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Engage in a fierce battle for control of the mystical Venga Islands!  Capture regions for either King Burr the Little or Queen Allison the Wise by fighting hordes of skeletons, trolls, ogres, and more.  Gold LIVE players will share a dynamic, persistent world that will change as regions are captured, lost, and recaptured by other players.
